item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Example Lazy Load Image
item.description: Nya nya nyan meow meow mama More napping, more napping all the napping is exhausting stretch out on bed you are a captive audience while sitting on the toilet, pet me slap the dog because cats rule bleghbleghvomit my furball really tie the room together always hungry. Humans,humans, humans oh how much they love us felines we are the center of attention they feed, they clean miaow then turn around and show you my bum.
